description: A78 files are used by a variety of emulators to play older Atari games on computers. Some Atari 7800 emulators that can open A78 files include Emu7800, ProSystem Emulator, MESS, and OpenEmu.
Atari 7800 is a video game console released in 1986 that replaced the Atari 5200. Some Atari 7800 game titles include Centipede, Dig Dug, Ms. Pac-Man, and Desert Falcon.
